title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Take this $20,000 for Rigging the Jury"
description: Sammy tells a story from the neighborhood back in the day. The mob was constantly trying to give back to their people, and this is a perfect example of just how intertwined the two were.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy tells a story from the neighborhood back in the day. The mob was constantly trying to give back to their people, and this is a perfect example of just how intertwined the two were.
